text: Vivian Anthony Stanshall (born on the 21st of March 1943 â€“ died on the 5th of March 1995) was an English singer-songwriter, musician, author and poet, best known for his work with the Bonzo Dog Doo-Dah Band. Stanshall was also an acclaimed Poet. Sixteen days before he turned 52, he died in a house fire on 5th of March 1995. Category:1943 births Category:1995 deaths Category:British singer-songwriters
title: Vivian Stanshall
